column4: anyone using vnc4server ? when trying to start it, it gives me the following error message 'libstdc++-libc6.2-2.so.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory' ; i can't find this package in synaptic... ;/
i need to remote into this server from another machine using vnc client
any time youre looking for a command, open up a terminal and type the first few letters of it, then hit TAB
